title: Opinion Dynamics with Set-Based Confidence: Convergence Criteria and Periodic Solutions
abstract: arXiv:2408.01753v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: This paper introduces a new multidimensional extension of the Hegselmann-Krause (HK) opinion dynamics model, where opinion proximity is not determined by a norm or metric. Instead, each agent trusts opinions within the Minkowski sum $\xi+\mathcal{O}$, where $\xi$ is the agent's current opinion and $\mathcal{O}$ is the confidence set defining acceptable deviations. During each iteration, agents update their opinions by simultaneously averaging the trusted opinions. Unlike traditional HK systems, where $\mathcal{O}$ is a ball in some norm, our model allows the confidence set to be non-convex and even unbounded.   We demonstrate that the new model, referred to as SCOD (Set-based Confidence Opinion Dynamics), can exhibit properties absent in the conventional HK model. Title: 基于集合置信度的观点动态演化：收敛准则和周期解
摘要：arXiv:2408.01753v1 公告类型：交叉  摘要：本文引入了赫泽尔曼-克劳泽（Hegselmann-Krause，HK）观点动态模型的一个新的多维扩展版本，在该模型中，观点的接近性不是由一个规范或度量确定的。相反，每个代理方信任的是闵可夫斯基和$\xi+\mathcal{O}$中的观点，其中$\xi$是代理方目前的观点，$\mathcal{O}$是定义可接受偏差的置信集。在每次迭代中，代理方同时更新他们的观点，通常通过同时平均可信任的观点。与传统的HK系统不同，在传统的HK系统中，$\mathcal{O}$是一个在某些规范下的球体，我们的模型允许置信集是非凸的，甚至可以是无限的。

我们展示了新的模型，称为SCOD（Set-based Confidence Opinion Dynamics），可能会表现出传统HK模型中不存在的一些特性。一些解可能会在状态空间中收敛到非均衡点，而其他解则会周期性地振荡。如果置信集$\mathcal{O}$是对称的，这些“病态”就会消失。
